solution_line_template: George’s turtle finished {george_quicker_minutes} minutes quicker than Greta’s so {greta_time}-{george_quicker_minutes} = <<{greta_time}-{george_quicker_minutes}={george_time}>>{george_time} minutes to finish
Gloria’s turtle took twice as long as George’s turtle, who finished in {george_time} minutes so {twice_multiplier}*{george_time} = <<{gloria_time}={gloria_time}>>{gloria_time} minutes
